alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 2:37PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Blount, southern Cocke and Sevier Counties through 415 PM EST... At 337 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of New Market to 8 miles northwest of Smoky Mountains-Twentymile Creek. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sevierville, Gatlinburg, Pigeon Forge, Smoky Mountains-Newfound Gap, Smoky Mountains-Fontana Area, Smoky Mountains-Balsam Mountain, Pittman Center, Townsend, Fairgarden and Wears Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains
